summary: This document consists of email correspondence primarily between Jes Staley and Steve White regarding the sending of images of a 90-foot yawl owned by Staley. The emails include multiple attachments of images related to the yawl, indicating a personal or business interest in the vessel.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the sender of the email and is discussing images of his 90-foot yawl.

persons.name: Steve White
persons.context: Steve White is the recipient of the email from Jes Staley, involved in the exchange of images of the yawl.

connections.description: Jes Staley and Steve White are engaged in a personal correspondence regarding images of Staley's yawl.

keyFacts: The document contains email correspondence dated June 14, 2009.
Jes Staley is sending images of his 90-foot yawl to Steve White.
Multiple images of the yawl are attached to the email.
The email indicates a personal or business interest in the vessel.
There is a note regarding email security settings for attachments.
